mapper.select: select * from tb_file where mapperid = #{mapperid} order by createtime
select * from tb_file where id = #{fileid} order by createtime
mapper.insert: insert into tb_file (id, type, mapperid, createtime, filename, fileurl) values ( regexp_replace('' || uuid_generate_v4(), '-', '', 'g'), #{type}, #{mapperid}, now(), #{filename}, #{fileurl} )

insert.foreach: insert into tb_file (id, type, mapperid, createtime, filename, fileurl) values ( regexp_replace('' || uuid_generate_v4(), '-', '', 'g'), #{item.type}, #{item.mapperid}, now(), #{item.filename}, #{item.fileurl} )
